<RESUME_START>
LEAD SENIOR SAP AUDITOR
Career Focus
Insightful, results-driven IT professional and CISSP with 6 years of risk assurance advisory experience in information technology security.
Notable success directing a broad range of IT security assessments and corporate initiatives while participating in planning, analysis, and implementation of solutions in support of business objectives.
Hands-on experience leading all stages of system development efforts, including requirements definition, design, architecture, testing, and support.
Certificates & Awards
Certified Public Accountant (CPA) Certified Information System Security Professional (CISSP) Certificate of Cloud Security Knowledge (CCSK) Certified Internal Audit (CIA)
Certified Information System Auditor (CISA) Industry Proficiency certified in Oil & Gas and Public Sector at Deloitte
Earned Applause awards 5 times for Excellent Engagement Performance at Deloitte

Utilized Suite GRC 5.3 to perform SOD analysis within the Risk Analysis Remediation module (RAR), created and provisioned Super User Privilege Management (SPM) roles & user ID's through the SPM module and created user access requests in the Compliant User Provisioning (CUP) module Designed and created SAP roles including parent/derived composite and single security roles, security processes and user assignment workflows, and custom security restrictions; investigated and resolved SAP security issues through creation and changes to security roles
Leveraged SAP's profile generator and authorization management tool to address security defects during a project's testing cycles, scope change requests and production support Consulted with key project and client stakeholders to solicit into the business and IT process control design Led control validation workshops with client team members Managed integration activities across related project teams and driving cross-team issue; coordinated with project team leads (functional and technical) and SAP security team members to resolve issues timely Led an internal team to develop the Enterprise Value Delivery methodology and templates for the SAP implementation engagements; developed training programs on firm technology project standards and delivered the training to ~200 professionals

<JD_START>
Job Title: Quality Control/Assurance

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Production, Quality Assurance, Science

Description:
Quality Control/Quality Assurance
Bi-lingual Spanish a Big plus

Our company located in Chicago has multiple plant operations producing Fresh food products. We need to add a Leadership focused Quality Control/Quality Assurance Manger to our staff who will build on the excellent quality standards we already have which has made our products a leader.

In this role you will be responsible for:

Assessing our current standards for compliance with established company standardsWorking with the quality staff to enhance their skills and to ensure the competency of their practices and to develop them for increased responsibilitiesTo ensure we are applying both FDA and USDA standardsTo establish standard practices for quality testing of our in process and finished goods productsTo bring the Quality awareness to our production organization with training and educationTo ensure compliance with proper and complete documentation of the manufacturing production and testing processTo verify through report and inspection processes that compliance with quality requirements are in placeTo perform internal audits on a regular basisTo ensure vendor and supplier quality standards and complianceTo develop training and education for hourly employees in quality requirementsTo interface with external Quality inspectors from both our customers and industry audit organizationsThe development of quality process for equipment function and housekeeping standardsTo develop recommendations for equipment, process or educational needs to enhance the role of Quality within the organizationTo establish reporting through data process methodology where information on the Quality process and result can be captured.To coordinate with upper management on Quality results, waste and Quality improvement needs.Will evaluate practices in GMP, SOP, HACCAP, Food Safety and Sanitation and equipment standards to ensure compliance with required standards


In this role we will expect you to provide the leadership, education and involvement with all levels in our organization and or with the customers we serve and to communicate with all stakeholder both internally as well as externally.
Send your resume to us.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
